Then <S%G5119><s%> Going Out <S%G1831><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Chaldeans, <S%G5466><s%> He Dwelt <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Haran, <S%G5488><s%> And Thence <S%G2547><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> His <S%G846><s%> He Removed <S%G3351><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G1093><s%> Land <S%G3778><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Dwell. <S%G2730><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> He Did Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> An Inheritance <S%G2817><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> A Foot's <S%G968><s%> Tread; <S%G4228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Promised <S%G1861><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Possession <S%G2697><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> His <S%G846><s%> ' After <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> There <S%G3756><s%> Not Being <S%G5607><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Child. <S%G5043><s%>

<S%G2980><s%> And Spoke <S%G1161><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God : <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> His <S%G846><s%> A Sojourner <S%G3941><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Land <S%G1093><s%> Strange, <S%G245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Enslave <S%G1402><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ill Treat <S%G2559><s%> It Years <S%G2094><s%> Four Hundred; <S%G5071><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> <S%G3739><s%> To Which <S%G1437><s%> They May Be In Bondage <S%G1398><s%> Will Judge <S%G2919><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> They Shall Come Forth <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Serve <S%G3000><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> This. <S%G5129><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Covenant <S%G1242><s%> Of Circumcision; <S%G4061><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> He Begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Circumcised <S%G4059><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eighth; <S%G3590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Isaac Begat <S%G2464><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Patriarchs. <S%G3966><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Patriarchs, <S%G3966><s%> Envying <S%G2206><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> Sold Him <S%G591><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt. <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Delivered <S%G1807><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> Tribulations, <S%G2347><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Favour <S%G5485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> Before <S%G1726><s%> Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of Egypt, <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Appointed <S%G2525><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Ruler <S%G2233><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House. <S%G3624><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> But Came <S%G1161><s%> A Famine <S%G3042><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Egypt <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Canaan, <S%G5477><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Did <S%G3756><s%> Not Find <S%G2147><s%> Sustenance <S%G5527><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers. <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G191><s%> But Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> Was <S%G5607><s%> Corn <S%G4621><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> Sent Forth <S%G1821><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> First; <S%G4412><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second Time <S%G1208><s%> Was Made Known <S%G319><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Known <S%G5318><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Family <S%G1085><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Joseph. <S%G2501><s%>

<S%G649><s%> And Having Sent <S%G1161><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> He Called For <S%G3333><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Kindred, <S%G4772><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Seventy <S%G1440><s%> Five. <S%G4002><s%>

<S%G2597><s%> And Went Down <S%G1161><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Died, <S%G5053><s%> He <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Carried Over <S%G3346><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Shechem, <S%G4966><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Placed <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb <S%G3418><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Bought <S%G5608><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> For A Sum <S%G5092><s%> Of Money <S%G694><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Hamor <S%G1697><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Shechem. <S%G4966><s%>

<S%G2531><s%> But As <S%G1161><s%> Drew Near <S%G1448><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Swore <S%G3660><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Increased <S%G837><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Multiplied <S%G4129><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%>
<S%G891><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> Arose <S%G450><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Another, <S%G2087><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Knew <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%>

He <S%G3778><s%> Having Dealt Subtilly With <S%G2686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Race, <S%G1085><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Ill Treated <S%G2559><s%> Our <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Fathers; <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> Exposed <S%G1570><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Babes <S%G1025><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> That <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G3361><s%> Might Not Live. <S%G2225><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Was Born <S%G1080><s%> , Moses, <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Beautiful <S%G791><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Brought Up <S%G397><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Father. <S%G3962><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1620><s%> And Being Exposed <S%G1161><s%> He, <S%G846><s%> Took Up <S%G337><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Of Pharaoh, <S%G5328><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brought Up <S%G397><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> For Herself <S%G1438><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Son. <S%G5207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Instructed <S%G3811><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> In All <S%G3956><s%> The Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> Of The Egyptians, <S%G124><s%> And <S%G2258><s%> He Was <S%G1161><s%> Mighty <S%G1415><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> Was Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Of Forty Years <S%G5063><s%> A Period, <S%G5550><s%> It Came <S%G305><s%> Into <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> His <S%G846><s%> To Look Upon <S%G1980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel; <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> A Certain One <S%G5100><s%> Being Wronged, <S%G91><s%> He Defended Him <S%G292><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4160><s%> Avenged <S%G1557><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> Being Oppressed, <S%G2669><s%> Having Smitten <S%G3960><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Egyptian. <S%G124><s%>

<S%G3543><s%> For He Thought <S%G1161><s%> Would Understand <S%G4920><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Is Giving <S%G1325><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Salvation. <S%G4991><s%> But <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Understood Not. <S%G4920><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> On The <S%G5037><s%> Following <S%G1966><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Appeared To <S%G3700><s%> Those Who <S%G846><s%> Were Contending, <S%G3164><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Urged <S%G4900><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Why <S%G2444><s%> Wrong Ye <S%G91><s%> One Another? <S%G240><s%>

But He <S%G3588><s%> Who <S%G1161><s%> Was Wronging His <S%G91><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Neighbour <S%G4139><s%> Thrust Away <S%G683><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Appointed <S%G2525><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judge <S%G1348><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Us? <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> To Put To Death <S%G337><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Wishest, <S%G2309><s%> In <S%G3739><s%> The Way <S%G5158><s%> Thou Puttest To Death <S%G337><s%> Yesterday <S%G5504><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Egyptian? <S%G124><s%>

<S%G5343><s%> And Fled <S%G1161><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Saying, <S%G5129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> A Sojourner <S%G3941><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Midian, <S%G3099><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> He Begat <S%G1080><s%> Souls <S%G5207><s%> Two. <S%G1417><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Being Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desert <S%G2048><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> Sinai <S%G4614><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Flame <S%G5395><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> Of A Bush. <S%G942><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Seeing It <S%G1492><s%> Wondered At <S%G2296><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vision; <S%G3705><s%> <S%G4334><s%> And Coming Near <S%G1161><s%> He <S%G846><s%> To Consider It, <S%G2657><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%>

I Am <S%G1473><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Fathers, <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Jacob. <S%G2384><s%> And Trembling <S%G1790><s%> Having <S%G1161><s%> Become <S%G1096><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> He <S%G3756><s%> Durst Not <S%G5111><s%> Consider It. <S%G2657><s%>

And <S%G2036><s%> Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Loose <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sandal <S%G5266><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Feet <S%G4228><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Standest, <S%G2476><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Seeing <S%G1492><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ill Treatment <S%G2561><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Groaning <S%G4726><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Heard, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came Down <S%G2597><s%> To Take Out <S%G1807><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Come, <S%G1204><s%> I Will Send <S%G649><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Egypt. <S%G125><s%>

This <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Refused, <S%G720><s%> Saying, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Appointed <S%G2525><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judge? <S%G1348><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God As <S%G2316><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Deliverer <S%G3086><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> By The <S%G1722><s%> Hand Of <S%G5495><s%> The Angel <S%G32><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bush. <S%G942><s%>
